channel.title: minor on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.
channel.description: Recent content in minor on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.

item.title: Bing (冰)
item.description: Great little girl we got from Frank Payne. I am a huge fan of her shoulder patches and her night sky pattern on the dark body sections. Her older sister, Violet, was our first female; however, we have not gotten any clutches from her yet. Bing is a sweetheart, and we hope to hatch our first clutches from her in 2021!

item.title: Feng (风)
item.description: Another little girl we got from Frank Payne. She’s very healthy and vibrant with an nice dark background on her body. Feng Feng1 Feng10 Feng11

item.title: Huo (火)
item.description: Beautiful female that we picked up from Kevin Stanford. She has a really nice pitch-black body with a fire tip on the top of her yellow streaks. Stunning specimen of this species! We were able to get a few healthy clutches from her and hope to produce our first clutch from them.

item.title: Di (地)
item.description: Our first adult male from Frank Payne Di Sire M3 Dam F5
